input_text:
Job Title: Machinist

Location: Frederick, MD

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Management, Manufacturing

Description:
At Spectrum Control, most departments operate on a 4-day, 10-hour work schedule in exchange for a 3-day weekend. We offer competitive wages and PTO, plus our benefits begin on day 1 of employment. Come join a workforce where we put you first!

The machinist will set-up and operate all types of machine tools such as: lathes, milling machines, CNC, grinders, saws and lappers to be used to machine metal, plastic or other pieces to specifications, tooling instructions or standard charts by applying knowledge of machining methods.

JOB FUNCTIONS:

Create and modify product fixtures and tools using machine equipment and techniques acquired by experienceSet-up and operate CNC vertical machining centers (VMC)Edit CNC programs as neededMachine and modify prototype parts and fixtures and engineering tooling as directedPerform basic maintenance on CNC, VMC, HMC, Turning Center and manual machinesStudy drawings and specifications to determine dimensions and tolerances of a finished piece, sequence of operations and set-up requirementsMeasure finished parts to verify dimensions and toleranceAble to measure, cut or work on items with great accuracyAble to produce parts within tolerances

QUALIFICATIONS:

Education: High School or EquivalentExperience Years: 1-3 years Experience Type: Machine Shop/Trade School OREquivalent combination of education and experienceKnowledge of safety standards for equipment being operatedAble to work with close tolerancesAble to read and interpret printsKnowledge of G and M code CNC ProgramsAble to quickly react to non-conforming as they occurMechanical drawing experience

WORK ENVIRONMENT: Manufacturing Floor Based

Equal Opportunity Employer/Protected Veterans/Individuals with Disabilities

The contractor will not discharge or in any other manner discriminate against employees or applicants because they have inquired about, discussed, or disclosed their own pay or the pay of another employee or applicant. However, employees who have access to the compensation information of other employees or applicants as a part of their essential job functions cannot disclose the pay of other employees or applicants to individuals who do not otherwise have access to compensation information, unless the disclosure is (a) in response to a formal complaint or charge, (b) in furtherance of an investigation, proceeding, hearing, or action, including an investigation conducted by the employer, or (c) consistent with the contractorâ€™s legal duty to furnish information. 41 CFR 60-1.35(c)

Third-Party Recruiters

Please note, that per Spectrum Control Policy, we do not accept unsolicited resumes from third-party recruiters unless such recruiters are engaged to provide candidates for a specified opening and in alignment with our values and expectations. Any employment agency, person or entity that submits an unsolicited resume does so with the understanding that Spectrum Control will have the right to hire that applicant at its discretion without any fee owed to the submitting employment agency, person or entity. If you or your agency are interested in becoming an approved vendor please contact scirecruiting@am.spectrumcontrol.com.

Experience Level (if available): Entry level

output_json.title: Machinist
job_responsibilities: Set-up and operate all types of machine tools
Machine and modify prototype parts and fixtures
Perform basic maintenance on CNC, VMC, HMC, Turning Center and manual machines
Study drawings and specifications to determine dimensions and tolerances
Measure finished parts to verify dimensions and tolerance
Able to measure, cut or work on items with great accuracy
Able to produce parts within tolerances
benefits: benefits beginning on day 1 of employment
output_json.company_information: Spectrum Control offers a 4-day, 10-hour work schedule in exchange for a 3-day weekend. Competitive wages, PTO, and benefits start on day 1 of employment.
output_json.equal_opportunity_policy: Equal Opportunity Employer/Protected Veterans/Individuals with Disabilities
